summary: leishmaniasis is a parasitic disease caused by a protozoan of the protozoan of the leishmania genus. it remains a main public health concern at global level and in Arab world mainly in low-income countries. this study describes a bibliometric review of all leishmaniasis research publications published between January 1998 and December 2017. the data presented in the current study may serve relevant researchers to direct the global leishmaniasis research to Arab counties in which leishmaniasis is endemic.
